full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Cavity Filter(s) 108-174 MHz

**Contract Reference Number:** cb-7-80211233
**Amendment Number:** 8
**Solicitation Number:** NCF108-174
**Publication Date:** October 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 9, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** November 14, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** February 29, 2024

### Solicitation Overview

The Innovation, Science and Economic Development (ISED) Spectrum and Telecommunications Sector invites suppliers to submit a bid for providing Cavity Filters (108-174 MHz) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC. The solicitation includes requirements outlined in the attached documentation, specifically in the Annex A: Equipment List.

### Submission Requirements

*idders are required to provide a bid that meets all the evaluation criteria and terms and conditions outlined in the SA.
* The bid must include a firm price in Canadian dollars, destination duties paid (DDP), and freight costs included.
* Goods and Services Tax (GST) and Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) will not be included for evaluation purposes.
* The Total Evaluated Bid Price is the sum of all items listed in Annex A.

### Evaluation Criteria

* Technical compliance to the requirements presented in the solicitation and annex A.
* Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) product(s) offered.
* The lowest priced responsive bid on an aggregate basis will be recommended for award.

### Contract Term and Conditions

* The contractor must provide goods in accordance with the requirements stated in the solicitation and annex A.
* Delivery is requested to be completed by no later than February 29, 2024.
* Payment terms will be based on the firm prices specified in the contract, with Goods and Services Tax (GST) and/or Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) included.

### Eligible Suppliers

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
* ANIXTER CANADA INC (E60HN-16ELEC/001/HN)
* GRAYBAR CANADA (E60HN-16ELEC/002/HN)
* Additional suppliers are listed in the attached documentation.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:
* Samantha Amadio
* (343) 542-2505
* samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca
